item.description: WhenSun, July 31, 9:30pm – Mon, August 1, 2:00am An event that caters to mature lesbians who enjoy a great night life, and prefer the serenity and ambiance of a lounge infused with great music. The goal of the night is to provide a chic and sophisticated atmosphere where trendy, mature lesbians can socialize, network, mingle, and have a good time enjoying weekly entertainment and an eclectic mix of music. The venue has two floors that incorporate a laid back vibe on the top floor spinning jazz, hip-hop, R&B, and a underground scene on the bottom floor spinning house, techno, dance, reggae, and more. The event is 21+ proper dress is required. No cover

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: SHE Sundays-Boston, MA
